thread.section_title: Brake Performance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brake Performance | brakeperformance.com
thread.title: Sam Scranton
thread.title_full: Brake Performance reviewed by Sam Scranton

author: Sam Scranton
title: Sam Scranton
text: Performance Brake is a top notch place to buy brake parts from. They have high quality parts and great customer service. I had ordered a brake kit a few days ago and then noticed that they started a new sale, I contacted them and they honored the sale price, giving me a refund for the difference in what I paid and the new sale price. Not many places would do that. 5 stars to these guys. And best of all every time I buy their parts the fit perfectly. Thank you Performance Brake!!!
